tool_description: FASTEST real-time Telegram API. Fetch channel's info and messages in milliseconds. FREE if getting empty response!
name: Telegram Channel
title: Telegram Channel

api_list.name: Get latest messages
api_list.description:
The endpoint fetches messages from Telegram Channel. The channel should be public.
[How to find the telegram channel name?](https://rapidapi.com/akrakoro/api/telegram-channel/details)
- id
- author
- date
- text
- html
- forwarded
- button
- link
- photo
- video
- audio
- sticker
- attachment
- media_poll
- `user_read_status` (`read` /  `unread`)

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: maximize message id, all the messages with a higher (newer) ID to this will be excluded.

api_list.name: Get channel info
api_list.description:
The endpoint returns real-time information about the public Telegram Channel.
[How to find the telegram channel name?](https://rapidapi.com/akrakoro/api/telegram-channel/details)
- title
- chat_type  (`channel` / `group` / `unknown`)
- image
- description
- subscribers
- subscribers_online
- verified
